page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: The Leisure Centre in Havant has included within it a swimming pool that was built a long time ago.The Leisure Centre was built onto the swimming pool about five years ago.The disabled have accesible facilities that include swimming and sauna.There is facilities for most indoor sports plus roller disco and other leisure activities.Havant Park has a large open space and a swing park at one end and two tennis courts.The golf course is very large and covers about half km of Farlington.There is a sports pitch in Langstone which is owned by IBM.They play certain sports in Havant Park as well.Just south of Stockheath is where Havant Rugby Club takes place.In our area there are a lot of swing parks with childrens playthings.
